description:
In nova/compute/manager.py, the code path

build_and_run_instance()
do_build_and_run_instance()
 _build_and_run_instance()

seems to be dead code, used by nothing but the unit tests.  It looks like the code that is actually being used is run_instance().
title: build_and_run_instance() appears to be dead code

comments.content:
In nova/compute/manager.py, the code path

build_and_run_instance()
do_build_and_run_instance()
 _build_and_run_instance()

seems to be dead code, used by nothing but the unit tests.  It looks like the code that is actually being used is run_instance().

comments.content: Sorry for the noise, I started reading the code and realized that it was just taking a long time to transition over to the new function.
